tidy for `SingleCellExperiment`

tidy(object)

# S3 method for class 'SingleCellExperiment'
tidy(object)

Arguments

object

A `SingleCellExperiment` object.

Value

A `tidySingleCellExperiment` object.

Examples

data(pbmc_small)
